SongLyrics.JpnStr: 青[あお]い 青[あお]い 空[そら]に 月[つき]の 光[ひかり]をともす
SongLyrics.EngStr: In the blue, blue sky, the moonlight shines.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 甘[あま]く 淡[あわ]く 重[おも]い そんなものに捉[とら]われて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Captured by something sweet, faint, and heavy.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: この 月明[つきあか]りの 下[した] ひとり 知[し]れず
SongLyrics.EngStr: Under this moonlight, silently alone.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の 名前[なまえ]だけを 呼[よ]んでいた
SongLyrics.EngStr: I was calling out only your name.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いつまでも 未来[みらい]を さがしてた
SongLyrics.EngStr: I was always searching for the future.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: この 光[ひかり]の 中[なか]に‥
SongLyrics.EngStr: In this light...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いつも いつも そばで 信[しん]じてゆく 力[ちから]が
SongLyrics.EngStr: Always, always, the power to believe by your side.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 遠[とお]く 脆[もろ]い ものを 動[うご]かしてる 気[き]がしてた
SongLyrics.EngStr: I felt like it was moving something distant and fragile.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: この 月明[つきあか]りの 下[した] ひとり 知[し]れず
SongLyrics.EngStr: Under this moonlight, silently alone.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の 名前[なまえ]だけを 呼[よ]んでいた
SongLyrics.EngStr: I was calling out only your name.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 静[しず]かな 愛情[あいじょう]を 信[しん]じてた
SongLyrics.EngStr: I believed in a quiet love.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: この 光[ひかり]の 中[なか]に‥
SongLyrics.EngStr: In this light...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何[なに]も 掴[つか]めないような 夜[よる]には
SongLyrics.EngStr: On nights when I can't grasp anything.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]を 想[おも]わないときは ない
SongLyrics.EngStr: There isn't a time when I don't think of you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: There isn't a day I don't think about it
迷[まよ]う 心[こころ]が 君[きみ]に 届[とど]くように
SongLyrics.EngStr: So that my wandering heart reaches you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: この 月明[つきあか]りの 下[した]で 私[わたし]の 名前[なまえ]を 呼[よ]んで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Under this moonlight, call my name.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: たしかに 逢[あ]いにゆくよ どこへでも
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll definitely come to meet you, wherever you are.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の そばに
SongLyrics.EngStr: By your side.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: この 月明[つきあか]り 瞬[まばた]き ひとつせず
SongLyrics.EngStr: This moonlight doesn't blink even once.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 静[しず]かに 私[わたし]を 見[み]つめていた
SongLyrics.EngStr: It quietly gazes at me.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]との 未来[みらい]を さがしてた
SongLyrics.EngStr: I was searching for a future with you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: この 光[ひかり]の 中[なか]に‥
SongLyrics.EngStr: In this light...
